title: Instructional Design Practical Competency Strengthening: Learning Experience Design (LXD) Expert Development Workshop

context.prior_knowledge: Foundational instructional systems design (ISD) theory and experience with multimedia authoring tools
context.additional_context: Instructional design competency enhancement program for professionals in education/teaching/learning fields

learning_goals: Science education content design documents can be created using the LXD core KSA (Knowledge/Skills/Abilities) framework
Two or more learner-centered digital learning materials can be developed using multimedia authoring tools (Canva, Adobe Express, etc.)
Apply Human-Centered Design (HCD) principles to develop one prototype of a science experiment simulation.
difficulty: Moderate - Standard complexity with some constraints
